snippet: Companies like Panasonic and Toshiba are pouring resources into developing "smart appliances" after losing out in the living room to cheaper Asian rivals.
lead_paragraph: Companies like Panasonic and Toshiba are pouring resources into developing "smart appliances" after losing out in the living room to cheaper Asian rivals.

headline.main: Japanese Firms Focus on Smart Kitchen Appliances
headline.print_headline: Japanese Firms Focus on Smart Kitchen Appliances
